item.title: Macron meets centrist Bayrou ahead of imminent decision on next French PM
item.description: Macron is seeking to restore political stability after Michel Barnier was ousted nine days ago.

item.title: Former Syria prison head charged with torture in US
item.description: Samir Ousman Alsheikh is accused of torturing and ordering the torture of prisoners at Adra Prison.

item.title: Explained: India's controversial Places of Worship law
item.description: India's top court is hearing petitions against a1991 law that protects the character of religious places.

item.title: Steven Bartlett sharing harmful health misinformation in Diary of CEO podcast
item.description: Disproven health claims are accepted with little challenge by host on number one podcast, BBC investigation finds.

item.title: The Indian teen who became the world's youngest chess champion
item.description: On Thursday Gukesh Dommaraju became the youngest world champion at the age of 18.
